english.segment1: Lord I come before You now. To worship You to worship You. I lay aside the obvious. Everyday mundane concerns
english.segment2: Forgive me when I pretend. That I dont need You here. When everything inside of me. Is reaching for Your hand
english.segment3: CHORUS: Im letting go of my pride. Im letting go of me. Im letting go of my life. I lay it at Your feet. Im falling down Im falling. Im falling at Your feet Lord. Im falling down Im falling. At Your feet and Im letting go
english.segment4: I want to live a life of truth. To honor You to honor You. And everyday a life renew. Rearranged Im not the same
